body.name: LED Double Head Desk Lamp,Double Swing-arm Table Lamps, Piano Lamp,Adjustable Brightness Color Temperature ，for Home/Reading/Offices/Bedrooms/Dormitories
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 3 mins
features: 【Modern design】-The table lamp adopts a double-head design, the lamp holder can be folded, able to be expanded by 180 degrees in left and right direction, with the 160-degree swing angle in up and down direction, providing you with a larger lighting coverage and angle. Exactly what you are looking for

【Stylish & sturdy】-This reading lamp is made of aluminum alloy and ABS material, which is sturdy and durable. It has a 6.3-inch wide lamp-socket, which is suitable for almost all types of tables. Personalize your desktop.

【Touch control】- The touch control of this LDE lamp is sensitive. There are 5 levels of brightness, 3 kinds of color temperature with adjustable range 3200K-6500k. The brightness and color temperature of the two lamp heads can be controlled independently or conduct merger control.

【Eye protection & energy saving:】-The double-swing-arm lamp emits uniformly and softly, no flicker, no glare, no shadow, very suitable for office, children's reading, double computer screen desktop, lighting of piano music score, student dormitory, etc.
【USB powered】-Environmentally friendly and There are more power options as all USB ports can be used to power our desk lamps， such as a ,mobile power supply or a mobile phone charger or computer etc

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #133,290 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #598 in Desk Lamps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect WFH addition
reviews.reviewText: Love the ability to adjust the type of lighting (warm, etc) but also the brightness level. Also great if you have 2 monitors, fits perfectly between them! The only thing I would maybe change is making the height adjustable but not required.Have had a number of friends ask about it and buy it themselves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great light for work
reviews.reviewText: Purchased one for a computer desk for a home office, and was impressed by the amount of light coverage. Was a natural choice when a lamp was requested for a work table in a sewing room. Second one works just as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Home Office
reviews.reviewText: It is an excellent product. The range of light that it gives off is very wide, so it would be perfect for a long desk as well. It's easy to use, but I wish the directions were a little bit more clear when putting it together. In addition, one of the screws was not long enough for the connection, so I had to get another screw to use. I still rate it highly though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to buy a lamp since my previous one broke. I had a hard time at first. I learned (in theory) that you do not need a charging box to plug into the usb cable. If you have an extension cord or even a multi outlet box/plug that has built in usb plugs. it’s best to plug it into those usb outlets instead of using a charging box. my lamp would flicker and eventually turn off. Not sure if mines is defective but it works perfectly fine after i left it in the usb plug in (without the box). it’s very simple to use and has a lot of different light options to choose from. I am rating it a 4 star because i wish it was more brighter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Find, better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I buy a lot of lights. I have had a lot of lights that once they arrive they aren’t what I expected. Very different in person then in pictures on line. Well this desk light is a lot better in person. It really serves us well for working, drafting, drawing, sewing, reading. I like the level of light control it offers, how it dims, quality of hues. It’s very pleasant. It also helps me get great lighting for live Zoom meetings. The light swivels and you can under light your face, as well as have one on the side, so you can achieve better lighting if you want to look more natural on a zoom meeting. I didn’t buy it for that but it’s an added bonus. That I can adjust a light under my iPod, under the camera and my face, out of frame. And it looks so much better than over head lighting that causes shadows. I also like that if you have two people working at a table one person can use on side and swivel it while the other person another side. Low energy usage a bonus. Modern Scandinavian design ascetic. I bought two and will buy more for other homes and business as this light is the perfect balance of form and function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Desk Lamp Available
reviews.reviewText: This lamp not only swivels in different directions, but you can changed the hue of the light to protect your eyes. It truly makes a difference. Most desk lamps advertise USB connections and the like. I have them on my PC and don't need more on a lamp. The other lamps also never have a long enough stem to get them up over your monitors and the base is so small, the lamps get knocked over. Then they are always in your way. This one fits nicely between my two monitors and reaches over the top. The base is slim and never gets in the way; but its wide enough to give the lamp stability. You do not have any screen glare from the light. I usually rotate it towards me when I want more light on my desktop area for depositing checks remotely or similar things. I bought another for my son because he like it so much when he saw it on my desk. It will be the last lamp you buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: I now have three of these in my office and workshop. They provide excellent and versatile illumination and the controls are reasonably intuitive, so once I have a setting I like, I can set it there again if needs be. I like the fact that it has two wings and they can be positioned a number of ways to provide exactly the illumination required for each task.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works great at first but doesn't last long for the price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this desk lamp for my office in March. It is more expensive than others but I really liked the dual arms because I use 2 computer monitors. It was easy to setup and thought it put out a decent amount of light. A few months later, after using it approximately 40 hours per week, the light is very dim and really doesn't add any light to my workspace. I plan to message the seller to see if replacement bulbs can be purchased and if they can't then it certainly is not worth the price for the length of time it worked.
Very light and clean design. Work as expected and more. Pleasant to have around, anywhere.
